artist: Engraver: Francis Anthony Aveline; Delineator: Antoine Boizot
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscriptions

on sheet below image in black:[A. Boizot  del   F. Aveline fil Sculp./CLOTAIRE III/ XIIIe. Roy de France/ Mort en 668, après 13 ans. de régne/ AParis chez O dieuvre, quai de l'Ecole, àla belle Image]; in pencil: [1-56]
life_date: Francis Anthony Aveline, Engraver, French, 1718–1762; Antoine Boizot, Delineator, French, 1704–1782
title: Portrait of Clotaire III
